parameters: \C[\V[6]]What will I need to do today?
\C[\V[7]]When is the minister going to visit us?
I'm good. Thank you for your concern.
My name is Alfred and I will be your personal
advisor to help you with whatever you need.
So feel free to ask me anything. I will try to
help you as best I can.
\C[\V[6]]What will I need to do today?
Today you will have to make a decision that
you think will contribute the most to the
island's growth and benefit the population.
You can do this by filling out the decisions
form at your table. Keep in mind that you
cannot go back after you make a decision.
I have to say that you should always consult
Maria and Laura before making decisions.
They will report how our financial situation is
and how the population feels, which will help
in choosing the best decisions to make.
Thank you, Alfred. I will keep that in mind.
\C[\V[7]]When is the minister going to visit us?
As of now, I haven't been informed of anything.
But I'll let you know in advance, don't worry.
For now concentrate on doing a good job.
I'll be here whenever you need me.
This morning two reports arrived. Which one do
The population is complaining about power outages in the
The worker that wrote this report has confirmed that the
renewable energies that the island is fully dependant on are
not being reliable enough to give electricity to the growing
Accordingly I can think of two solutions.
Invest more in reliable sources of energy.
I want to think a little more...
Invest more in researching a solution for the
Invest more in reliable sources of energy.
Invest more in reliable sources of energy, like
$gameVariables.setValue(25, 'Invest more in reliable sources of energy.')
I want to think a little more...
A researcher from your company has found out that Gaia has a
hotspot of thermal energy coming from the earth! He
suggested a geothermal plant on the area to produce power.
The bad news is that it would block some city
expansion plans for roads to travel around the island and
it'd make it difficult for you to travel to your house at
the end of the day...those roads would really help!
Accordingly I can think of two solutions.
I want to think a little more...
Push back against the city. Don't let them build the new
roads, and instead use the site to build a geothermal plant.
Don't do anything, it's better to not ruin somebody else's
I want to think a little more...
So far you haven't made any decisions.
I'm done for today. Good work everyone and
Bye bye everyone! See ya next time!

This morning one report has arrived.
A researcher from your company has found out that Gaia has a
hotspot of thermal energy coming from the earth! He
suggested a geothermal plant on the area to produce power.
The bad news is that it would block some city
expansion plans for roads to travel around the island and
it'd make it difficult for you to travel to your house at
the end of the day...those roads would really help!
Accordingly, I can think of two solutions.
I want to think a little more...
Push back against the city. Don't let them build the new
roads, and instead use the site to build a geothermal plant.
Im sorry boss, but we cannot make that
decision! We don't have enough money for it!

\C[\V[10]]Can you tell me more about yourself?
I'm okay, thanks for asking, boss!
\C[\V[10]]Can you tell me more about yourself?
I'm the manager of the financial resources of
I'll work to make sure the money's always

Well, basically, I'll tell you how much money
I can also advise you on spending it.

Hello boss, how can I help you?
\C[\V[15]]Can you tell me more about yourself?
\C[\V[15]]Can you tell me more about yourself?
I'm the manager of Human Resources here at the
I'll work to maintain a safe work environment,
To help you, I'll be analysing the perception
of the public about your decisions. Be it our
At my old job, I was a market researcher...
I also took into account the public's opinion.
I'm pretty sure it could help with the
I can make reports on it for you if you think
it's worth your time. Just talk to me about it.
Right now you have a neutral approval rate,
You should concentrate on increasing this rate
as much as possible, in order to gain the
support of the population and thus contribute
to the excellent management of Gaia Island.
Right now you have a positive approval rate,
more specifically \V[2]%. This means that you
are making the right decisions, which is
reflected in the support of the population.
You're doing good, boss. Keep up the good work.
Right now you have a high positive approval rate,
population is very happy with the decisions
you made until now. Keep it up, boss!
No problem. But don't get too carried away,
focus on maintaining it or increasing it.
I will keep that in mind.
Right now you have a negative approval rating,
population isn't liking the decisions you're
Try to pay more attention to the consequences
that your decisions may bring. Think more about
the island and how the population will react.
Thank you, Laura. I will keep that in mind.
No problem, boss. I'll be here if you need more
Right now you have a high negative approval rate,
more specifically -\V[1]%. This is looking really
bad, boss. We are losing the support of the
What do you mean by that?
We have to do something or worse things will
happen not only to the island but also to us.
Don't forget that the minister is testing us.
What happens to the island and the population
is our responsibility. Therefore, choose your
decisions much more carefully from now on.
I will be more careful for now on. Thank you,
No problem, boss. I'll be here if you need more
